author: r-young
post_text: September 13, 2014 at 8:06 PM#1Hi Everyone. I'm working on a auto palletizing macro, Basically want to extract the hard values out of a preset, then use those values to replace the hard values in a sequence with the preset. I can extract the preset values to the programmer, but I can't seem to figure out how to use the values in the programmer as my source for the replace. Anyone have any suggestions??Thanks,Ryan

posts.author: r-young
posts.post_text: September 13, 2014 at 8:54 PM#2In Fact upon further testing I don't seem to be able to replace any hard values with presets.If I hold fixture 1 at 10 percent in the programmer and search value 10 if programmer then get 1 result.If I replace value 10 with value 20 if programmer fixture 1 gets a value of 20 in the programmerIf I replace value 10 with preset 1.1 if programmer nothing happens.

title: Extract Replace
